description:
Inside a padded cell, things are sometimes not what they seem. Tyler Saint uses and abuses Christian Owen, who is suspended upside down in a straight jacket. Tyler goes further by turning Christian into a rat boy by using a tail butt plug and introducing him to the pleasures of rat traps. After a severe flogging, Tyler fucks Christian hard in bondage and cums all over his face.
Director's note: This update is the perfect opportunity to launch our new Bondage Store. I am proud to announce that Bound Gods has enlisted San Francisco's legendary Mr. S Leather to serve as our affiliate shop. Mr. S Leather makes the finest leather products around; it is an icon in leather communities worldwide. I have great respect and admiration for them and am very pleased to have them offering Bound Gods members the best BDSM gear you'll find anywhere. For most future updates to Bound Gods, you'll be able to find the gear used right here in our store. If you have questions about what gear is used in an update or on a certain model, or how the gear is used in an update, please use the Bound Gods Forum link above. Thank you!
title: The Rat Boy
